It is characterized by its translucent, waxy leaves that shimmer under sunlight, giving it an otherworldly appearance. The plant produces small, pale pink flowers that bloom only at night, releasing a faint, sweet scent. Lethedon thrives in humid, shaded environments, often near water sources in dense forests. Due to its elusive nature and limited habitat, it is considered a delicately balanced species within its ecosystem.
